column4: I hope someone with good bash and make skills can help me to answer what is the purpose of '@$<' ?
doesn't look like bash .. can you show us the line that has this?
have a look here http://www.gnu.org/software/make/manual/make.html#Automatic-Variables  if you don't find it here, try asking in #workingset
FYI, makefiles are not written in bash
